Download linksÂ¶

Note

Supported Operating Systems
We support Android version 4.0 (API level 14) and higher.

Here you can download the latest Ogury SDK : 2.1.11.

One you have download the jar and add the library in your libs folder, you can continue the integration with the Step 2 - Update AndroidManifest.xml of the Quick start Integration.

If you want to have more informations on manual Ogury integrations, you can go to Step 1 - Add the Ogury SDK to your project.
